column5: Anyone who is having issues with quoting please post here and tell us what browser you are using. If you know we also need what version you are using. Also please tell us if you have tried a different browser and if it still was broken.     Thanks   Art

Anyone who is having issues with quoting please post here and tell us what browser you are using. If you know we also need what version you are using. Also please tell us if you have tried a different browser and if it still was broken.     Thanks   Art   No problem here, Chrome browser (Just so you can mark that one off your list!)

So far it is just IE that is having the issue. We are trying to find out if it is all IE or just certain versions.    Art
since my PC forced an upgrade or two ago and upgraded me to IE11 I cannot quote.  It could be a SP the PC did BUT I bet it's an IE11 thing...
get Firefox or chrome, both free and excellent browsers also a lot less of a security risk IMO than IE, and faster

I have used them before and thanks.  If I do anything it will be Google.  I don't really need to quote someone.  Unless it's a "small piece of worthless crap, a decorative knick knack with little or no purpose".
